question:
Mohon di cek benar atau salahnya !    Petunjuk mengecek
1. Kata pertama adalah pekerjaan
2. Kata kedua adalah tempat bekerja
3. Kata ketiga adalah aktivitas bekerja
Soal
1. Headmaster, school, manages the school
2. Surgeon, Hospital, operates on patiens
3. Actress, Production house, acts on the stage
4. Journalist, Newspaper, writes articles
5. Driver, Travel agent, driver a bus
6. Mechanic, Workshop, repairs car
7. News reader, Radio station, reads the news
8. Waiter, Restaurant, offers the menu
9. Guide, Tourist agent, leads the tourist
10. Cashier, Bank, serves the customer

related_questions.question: What do you say when someone asks your opinion and you have something to say about it?

answers.answer: apa yang anda katakan ketika seseorang meminta pendapat anda dan anda memiliki sesuatu untuk mengatakan tentang hal itu?
May i add your opinion?

" A Spot Of Pneumonia

On Christmas Eve I first started feeling short of breath and on Friday the 27th I decided I couldn't ignore it anymore so I told mum and dad, I need to go to hospital and they willingly obliged.

On the 27th, they found the there was fluid on the other (the right) side (compared with the left). There wasn't as much fluid as there was last time so they drained it and I was allowed to go home

I was meant to be flying up to Waiheke Island and staying in this most stunning house which won house of the year for 2013! We were also meant to be staying with Jannie and Frank who are some of my favorite people in the world.

I decided that I still wanted to go but flying was out of the question so this time I made the other parent drive me to Auckland so dad obligingly did so. Aren't I lucky!

I made it up there but by that evening I wasn't feeling well and my oral antibiotics just weren't seeming to work. However we had missed the last ferry and had to wait til the morning and during this time dad put together an idea.

So the next day we trotted off to see the Waiheke GP and he gave me antibiotics which had to be given twice daily as antibiotics into my bum. About as nice as it sounds.

It actually seemed to work, I felt a bit better and my temp went down but it didn't last so by the 1st it was apparent I needed to go to the hospital. However I decided I didn't want to go to Auckland, so both parents did an almighty dash with me in the back in the car to here, Wellington hospital.

related_questions.question: Contoh warning dengan gambar dan penjelasannya?

answers.answer: Contoh Caution, Notice dan Warning Teks fungsional pendek Caution, Notice dan Warningberfungsi untuk mengingatkan seseorang agar tidak melakukan sesuatu, menyuruh seseorang melakukan sesuatu sesuai aturan, dan memperingatkan seseorang untuk menghindari sesuatu agar tidak terjadi sesuatu yang tidak diharapkan. Berikut ini contoh teks fungsional pendek berbentuk Caution, Notice dan Warning.

related_questions.question:
How to make omelette?

tolong ya dibantu...

answers.answer:
cara nya :
langkah 1 ;kocok telur dan bumbu sampai tercampur rata 
langkah 2:masukkan irisan jamur dan tomat panaskan wajan anti lengket dan api kecil  lalu diberi sedikit mentega / olive oil 
langkah 3: tuangkan kocokkan telur lalu taburkan keju parutnya . masak dgn api kecil sambil perlahan dikumpulkan kesatu sisi wajan .lipat telur lalu teruskan memasaknya  sampai sisi luar telur keemasan dan dalamnya lembut .....

Telur di kocok dan di tambah bawang bombay, garam, wortel, dan cabai bubuk. Diaduk rataPanaskan minyak di atas tempat untuk menggorengnya (api kecil) sampai benar-benar matangLalu omelet di taruh di atas selembar rumput laut, lalu di gulung sampai rapi dan padatDiamkanlah sejenak, setelah dingin bolehlah anda memotongnya.

related_questions.question: Tolong buatin dialog narative cerita rakyat 4 pemain

answers.answer: One day while a mousedeer was walking in the forest, he saw a big black snake sleeping under the tree. When he saw the snake, the mousedeer was frightened. When he wanted to run away from the snake, he suddenly fell on top of a tiger which was sleeping not far from the snake. The tiger woke up and took of the mousedeer. He told the mousedeer that he was going to eat him for lunch. “Please don’t eat me now,” said the mousedeer. “I have something important to do.”             “Look,” said the mousedeer. “That is the king’s belt. He asked me to stay here and watch it while he was away in the forest.” The tiger looked at the snake and said, “That is a beautiful belt. I need a belt like that. Can I wear it?” He asked the mousedeer.             “Oh all right,” said the mousedeer. So he picked up the snake and winded it around the tiger. Then the snake woke up and saw the tiger. The snake twisted itself tighter until the tiger couldn’t breathe. The tiger asked the mousedeer to help him. But the mousedeer turned and ran away into the forest.
